title: Bikerumor Pic Of  The Day: Oakridge, Oregon
content:
Photo submitted by Michael McQueen, “Jessica Burger descends Alpine trail in Oakridge, OR, on her birthday. She never expected to encounter snow on her late spring birthday, yet Oakridge delivers!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Oakridge, Oregon appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
